level.text: Any remaining funds of an inaugural committee shall be transferred only to either:

A non-profit organization within the meaning of Section 501(c) of the Internal Revenue Code operating in good standing in the District of Columbia for a minimum of one calendar year prior to the date of any transfer; or

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 60 DCR 1402 (February 8, 2013); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 60 DCR 11864 (August 16, 2013).
